overview: Grigory Pechorin, a dashing Byronic figure, arrives in Pyatigorsk and gets entangled in a web of romantic ploys and deceptions. Based on "Princess Mary", the longest novella in Mikhail Lermontov's "A Hero of Our Time".

production_companies.name: Main editorial board of literary and dramatic programs Central Television USSR

title: Pages from Pechorin's Journal
